Package gameobjects.ui

Class Button

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.GameObject
gameobjects.ui.Button
Direct Known Subclasses:
Tip, TowerButton
public abstract class Button extends GameObject
An abstract class for defining a clickable box-shaped button game object.
